description: A beautiful, functional and customizable launcher Productive: Ion Launcher shows you relevant information on the home screen when its needed, and organizes the app drawer into categories automatically Easy Customization: Customize your home screen fast, by changing only a handful of settings, like foreground and background colors Ergonomic: Elements are arranged in an optimal way for muscle memory and reachability Elegant: The design does not take a back seat in this launcher, the default setup looks great, and you can make it look even better with a couple adjustments Lightweight & fast: Ion Launcher is made to take up as little storage space as possible (within reason)
